description:
After you have secured an Interview and you have done all the prep work, How do you know if its the right role ? How do you know if its the company culture? its about the questions you ask to extract the information you need. 

Also I will speak from the client perspective on how to ask the right amount of questions to identify the right candidate for the role. 

We will be looking in detail about what the questions say about you as in individual or a company.
title: How's the Perl Jobs market
